description: Hotels are booked solid across the metropolis city due to many events set to occur over the weekend. Johnny Forza made a last minute booking and accidentally booked in the same room as Mike Edge. Johnny pleads that Mike give him the room, but Mike has only one thing on the mind for the weekend… getting laid. Johnny has two options that lay in front of him: sleep on the streets or offer himself up as Mike’s play toy for the weekend. Johnny chooses the second option and Mike has no qualms of accepting.
title: Booked Solid
